column1: More encouraging news in the fight against COVID-19!  A vaccine produced by Moderna in partnership with the @WhiteHouse & #OperationWarpSpeed has shown to be over 94% effective.  Thanks to our scientists and medical professionals we are one step closer to beating this virus! https://t.co/h7RKEnXNIv

It's clear that Americans rejected House Democrats' socialist agenda at the ballot box last week.   Now Speaker Pelosi and her colleagues are more focused on fighting with each other than working to provide much-needed COVID-19 relief to Texas families and small businesses.

This week Pfizer and BioNTech SE announced that their COVID-19 vaccine candidate has proven to be 90% effective.  Thanks to Operation Warp Speed if the FDA gives final approval we will have 100M doses ready for distribution & free of cost to Americans!  https://t.co/gZSgSncoC4

Yesterday Democrats BLOCKED another attempt by @SenateGOP to extend the #PPP.   A program that has helped 4.5 million Texas workers stay on the payroll of businesses hit hardest by COVID-19.   How long are Democrats going to hold COVID-19 relief hostage for political gain? https://t.co/G1XVedhOpT

The @IEDCtweets has named TX the best state in the nation for business for the 8th year in a row!  I'm glad to see that despite COVID-19 industry leaders are continuing to recognize the strong work ethic of Texans & the pro-growth climate our state offers to American businesses. https://t.co/c8OgwRZ3FQ

American businesses are counting on us to deliver a bipartisan compromise that provides targeted COVID-19 relief.  I'm proud to cosponsor @RepSteveChabot's common-sense bill that gives small businesses access the $138B of unused PPP funds.  We must always #FightForSmallBiz. https://t.co/c6rOTBAA8A

Great news! @HHSgov announced that Texas will receive over 500K point-of-care rapid COVID-19 tests for students and teachers across the state in the first week of distribution.  This is a vital step in ensuring Texas schools remain safe for our students teachers & faculty. https://t.co/TtTpbY4naH

I want to take a minute to thank all the health care heroes that have spent this past year battling COVID-19 on the front lines.   I know from experience how awesome y'all are and we are so grateful for your dedication and commitment to keeping us healthy. https://t.co/ptJ7hhWW8q

I'm glad to see that some Democrats are considering supporting @HouseGOP's discharge petition to extend the #PPP.  This common-sense bill calls for no new spending and allows small businesses that have been hit hard by COVID-19 to utilize the remaining funds left in the program. https://t.co/g21dsiPikP

It's vital that our health care providers have the resources they need to fight COVID-19.  I joined my fellow Texans led by @RepRWilliams & @RepEBJ to request that @HHSGov provide additional resources to areas in Texas that have been hit the hardest by the pandemic. 👇 https://t.co/WckCpGEOso

This morning my colleague @RepMcCaul released his final report on the origins and initial handling of COVID-19.   It's clear that the #CCP's coverup & WHO Director-General Tedros’s negligence led to COVID-19 becoming a global pandemic. Congress must hold them accountable. ⤵️ https://t.co/be2gxXjBSY

Under Operation Warp Speed the U.S. is developing an effective COVID-19 vaccine in record time without cutting any safety corners.   Thank you to all the doctors & health professionals that are working around the clock to develop & deliver this treatment to the American people. https://t.co/wTuG8JAEwz

Democrats just BLOCKED @SenateGOP's targeted COVID-19 bill aimed to protect workers' paychecks help schools re-open & provide resources to health care professionals.   It's clear that Democrats would rather play politics than deliver much-needed relief to the American people.

COVID-19 has shown us the importance of securing our supply chains & becoming medically independent from the #CCP.  I'm proud to cosponsor the IP Repatriation Act introduced by @RepLaHood that incentivizes American companies to bring their intellectual property back to the U.S. https://t.co/9sWQaCPfa3

A new report released by @SteveScalise & @SelectGOP shows that the #PPP has supported over 51M American jobs during the COVID-19 pandemic.   → This includes 13M jobs in economically distressed areas and 12M jobs in rural communities.   Read More ⤵️ https://t.co/FAHlD3frJf

Great news → After my colleagues & I sent a letter to @SecretarySonny last week the USDA announced it's extending flexibilities for school nutrition programs to ensure students have access to nutritious meals.   This is crucial as our nation recovers from the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/m6QifOgsAw

It's always great to chat with Michael Britton and the rest of @arlingtontx about the state of play in Washington.   We discussed COVID-19 relief California's anti-worker #AB5 bill re-opening schools and much more.   Watch the full discussion here ⤵️ https://t.co/XmPQlRrJFk https://t.co/izJouRtCwY

The Farmers to Families Food Box Program has delivered 70+ MILLION meals to hungry families around the country while providing support to American farmers ranchers and producers during COVID-19.  I applaud @POTUS and @SecretarySonny for continuing to fund this vital program. https://t.co/PzD21DWaui

With the new school year starting it's vital that schools have the flexibility they need to continue providing meals to our students during COVID-19.  I joined my @EdLaborGOP & @HouseAgGOP colleagues to ask the @USDA to ensure these programs are free of unnecessary red tape. 👇 https://t.co/f3wyCmo0eW

Last night I met with the TX-06 Asian American Advisory Committee to discuss what is needed in future federal COVID-19 relief packages and ways to secure our medical supply chain while holding the #CCP accountable.   Thank you to everyone who joined. It was a great discussion! https://t.co/gU2nHeJHZ6

Back in D.C. today for an “emergency” session in the House but instead of working on much-needed COVID-19 relief for American families workers & businesses Speaker Pelosi is focused on a $25B bailout for the USPS based on a manufactured crisis.   Americans deserve better. https://t.co/eX6PbA1Ywm

CA Democrats are putting Americans out of work through their bill #AB5 - making it harder for independent contractors to make ends meet during COVID-19.  This is one of the many reasons I voted NO on the #PROAct in February.   Americans should be able to work on their own terms.

Great meeting this morning (virtually) with @MatureAmericans members from the 6th District to discuss:   → The USPS  → COVID-19 relief package negotiations  → How Congress can hold the #CCP accountable   Thank you for having me and for the great questions! See y’all soon! https://t.co/RzxBp9i10H

Today I spoke with the @TexasFarmBureau to discuss actions my colleagues & I have taken in Congress to aid farmers & ranchers impacted by COVID-19.    Our ag community has been hit hard but we are doing everything we can to help our producers get back on their feet. #StillFarming https://t.co/tNclXoPzLP

Have you fully recovered from COVID-19? If so your plasma now contains antibodies that helped your immune system fight the virus.   Donating your plasma could help save up to three current COVID-19 patients!  Here is more info: https://t.co/kYKdLRn9ya https://t.co/bJGruENbqp

President Tsai Ing-wen has been a friend & a vital partner to the United States in the fight against COVID-19.   I applaud @SecAzar for being the first cabinet official to visit #Taiwan in 6 years. It's my hope that this trip strengthens our shared values of democracy & freedom. https://t.co/lNTGEXEN8i

Last week @HouseForeignGOP had a hearing to discuss the COVID-19 response across Africa.   I asked if the fighting between Cameroon’s government and the Anglophones have contributed to the COVID-19 spread & what's being done to ensure relief aid reaches the Anglophone region. ⤵️ https://t.co/tyed2PePZF

Great news → The @USDA has provided over 47 MILLION meals through the Farmers to Families Food Box Program.   This program buys produce from farmers impacted by COVID-19 and distributes them to families in need. A great way to help Americans get access to fresh & wholesome food. https://t.co/xq7QJFaDpb

Access to affordable and quality child care is crucial for our nation's continued economic recovery.   My colleagues and I led by @RepTomEmmer and @RodneyDavis urged House leadership to include additional child care funding in future COVID-19 relief packages.   Read More 👇 https://t.co/JhwZxAx50i

GREAT NEWS! The Paycheck Protection Program has already saved over 110000 jobs in the 6th District!  The #PPP Program is providing relief to our small businesses and saving jobs in Texas as we continue to fight COVID-19. https://t.co/06LCRKsey7
TODAY: Free COVID-19 Testing in Ennis from 10 AM - 4 PM.  Location: Tim Guana Park Community Center (301 W. Crockett St.)  This is a walk-up testing site and no registration is required!

We must safely reopen our schools this fall so we can continue to educate our students and help parents return to work.  If we don’t act on the looming crisis for schools and childcare it will worsen the economic crisis caused by COVID-19.  More from @GOPLeader 👇 https://t.co/tIeglfxvD3

Attention Ellis County: There are multiple free COVID-19 testing sites that will open across the county during the month of July:  Ennis → July 9-10 Ferris → July 15-16 Maypearl → July 20  More information 👇 https://t.co/NoSK4RZjO0

Yesterday I hopped back on Zoom to join the Midlothian Rotary Club. We talked about the federal government's COVID-19 response reopening schools the threat from Communist China and the discussion around voting by mail in Texas.   Thanks for having me and see y'all soon! https://t.co/cdd78SVZvo

Last week Tarrant County Area Food Bank held its largest food distribution ever at Globe Life Field. Volunteers served over 2500 families who are struggling because of the COVID-19 pandemic.   Thank you to everyone at @TAFoodBank for all your hard work! https://t.co/qBagZbC08C

TOMORROW is the last day for @SBAgov to approve #PPP loans.   The PPP program has been a crucial lifeline for Main Street helping over 4.5 million small businesses pay for expenses and keep employees on the payroll as we fight COVID-19.   Apply here → https://t.co/a9RWOpEQjk https://t.co/DYOqnUNIX9

June is National Dairy Month!  Farmers and ranchers across America especially dairy farms have been hit hard by COVID-19.  Join me in thanking our agriculture community for keeping Americans fueled and fed during this global pandemic. https://t.co/ZDUcUKxbvg

Yesterday I had a zoom call with the Arlington Chamber Partners in Education Advisory Council.  We talked about what @EdLaborGOP is doing to help support Arlington's education systems & workforce development programs in the midst of COVID-19.  Great to see everyone!

In yesterday’s @EdLaborGOP hearing we discussed the impact COVID19 is having on K-12 education.   Before we blindly spend more taxpayer dollars we need to pump the brakes & see what will work best for both our students & educators.   More federal funding is not always the answer. https://t.co/y2en1WGyYo

My colleague and fellow Texan @RepMcCaul released an interim report on the origins of COVID-19.   The facts are clear: The combination of the #CCP's coverup and the #WHO's missteps led to the coronavirus becoming a global pandemic.  Read more 👇 https://t.co/TrNCc6fpOb

I'm proud to cosponsor this legislation by @RepChipRoy & @RepDeanPhillips.  After talking to businesses in TX06 it's clear that the PPP needs reforms. This bill changes the terms of the loan to give small businesses the flexibility they need to stay open during COVID-19. https://t.co/9mp6vxI5kD

Applications are now OPEN for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program for farmers & ranchers who have been impacted by COVID-19.  Application → https://t.co/9sWdy2jzFm Quick Guide →  https://t.co/4HzKaq58EH More Info → https://t.co/WEbBE8xgZs https://t.co/BJl5cyFo85

I just finished up a great conversation with @NARPM.  We talked about what Congress has passed up to this point in relief aid and additional ways we can confront the challenges facing Texas property owners & renters impacted by COVID-19.

Just a reminder that the Democrats' last coronavirus relief bill said the word "cannabis" more than the word "jobs".   While 39 million Americans are unemployed and many are wondering if they will get their next paycheck Democrats are focused on pot.   Americans deserve better.

President Trump has taken 600+ deregulatory actions to fight COVID19 effectively & just signed a new E.O. that cuts unnecessary red tape giving businesses more flexibility to reopen.    These pro-growth policies are vital to jump-start the economy & get Americans back to work. https://t.co/N5sY8IeJLu

I agree with @realDonaldTrump. The WHO needs to be held accountable for their failed COVID-19 response.   We cannot continue to stand by and let the #WHO peddle Communist China's agenda to the global community. https://t.co/48eSf7sNaq

This week I hosted a webinar with @ConawayTX11 to talk about the federal government’s response to the ag community impacted by COVID-19.   Thank you to everyone that tuned in & asked questions. It was a great discussion!   Check it out here → https://t.co/OboErNgVOU https://t.co/uMWbsPIUam

Let's look at what Speaker Pelosi claims to be coronavirus relief ⤵️  ❌ Stimulus Checks for Illegal Immigrants ❌ Tax Cuts for Blue States ❌ Get out of Jail Free Cards for Prisoners ❌ Federal Takeover of Elections ❌ Anti-Worker Provisions  The American people deserve better.

If you still have any doubt of Communist China’s deliberate mishandling of COVID-19  check out this article by @GOPLeader.  We must ⤵️ → Hold the CCP accountable → Modernize the strategic national stockpile → Bring pharma manufacturing back to the U.S. https://t.co/97q0OezuAm

Americans across the country are hurting from coronavirus and what are Democrats focused on? Pushing their socialist agenda.   Shameful. Our nation deserves better from our elected officials.   A must watch video from @SteveScalise 👇 https://t.co/ppVuEhMVyA

Democrat Leadership released a 1800+ page liberal wish list costing over $3 trillion that includes items that have nothing to do with the COVID-19 pandemic.  All crafted in secret behind the closed doors of Speaker Pelosi's office with zero debate or input from Republicans. https://t.co/xC40rBvehg

The list of wrongdoings committed by the #CCP is extensive but one thing is clear they lied & people died. https://t.co/oqx83yjjOY

On this #NationalDayofPrayer I hope you will join me in praying for the health & safety all of Americans as we battle COVID-19 especially those on the front lines.   I pray for the continued strength of our nation as we recover from these trying times. God Bless. https://t.co/QHJdI0ckUu

Tomorrow at 11 AM CT the @BlueAngels will be flying over the #DFW area to thank all of our frontline COVID-19 responders.   From day one these heroes have gone above and beyond the call of duty risking their lives to keep Americans safe.   Check out the flight path ⤵️ https://t.co/hmfkgZgMGb

Communist China is STILL blocking U.S. scientists and health experts from researching the origin of coronavirus.  I agree with @SecPompeo. We need access to those labs to figure out what happened. The longer the #CCP refuses to cooperate the more lives will be lost. https://t.co/IeKGDzr0NL

Remember when Communist China tried to blame our military for COVID-19?   The #CCP is attempting to re-write history & shift blame to the United States for the origin of COVID-19.   We all know the truth. This virus originated in Wuhan. Period. https://t.co/ghTvFJXy6H

This is awesome @ArlingtonPD! What a great tribute to our health care workers and first responders.   Thank you to all these heroes that are keeping us safe and fighting #COVID19 on the front lines day in & day out. Our nation is so grateful. https://t.co/JtXacgc84e

The House just passed The PPP and Health Care Enhancement Act sending much-needed aid to the fight against COVID-19.  ✅$370 billion for small business relief ✅$75 billion for health cares workers on the front lines ✅$25 billion to ramp up testing  My full statement ⬇️ https://t.co/CXrj29qkZV

Thank you to all our private sector companies that are pitching in to help our health care heroes on the front lines in the fight against #COVID19.  These are just a few great headlines from today. #InItTogether ⤵️ https://t.co/VmwXEOgXAM

It remains my top priority to help our small businesses keep the lights on & American workers on their payroll.   Yesterday I sent a letter to @SpeakerPelosi and @GOPLeader urging the House to ensure that a majority of future #COVID19 assistance goes to small businesses. 👇 https://t.co/s0mozdubJe

I am so proud of how Americans have come together to support our small businesses but the fight against COVID-19 is not over yet.  As Texas begins to re-open in the coming weeks we must continue to do our part by ordering take out shopping online & buying in advance. https://t.co/tbQKmFi9x6

Under @realDonaldTrump’s leadership the Coronavirus Task Force introduced a three-phased approach to reopening our nation. This common-sense plan will open our economy up for business while continuing to prioritize the safety of Americans.   More info ⤵️ https://t.co/gvKCAgyK7h

Great news for North Texas! This VA facility will open its doors months early to provide 200+ beds for #COVID19 patients. Thank you to our nation’s truckers that have been so vital in the fight against COVID-19. @realDonaldTrump is right you are the lifeblood of our economy! #ThankATrucker 🇺🇸 https://t.co/v8sgC00jnh

Thank you @GM for all you are doing to help our nation fight COVID-19. #InItTogether https://t.co/ehoXUDsvun

The Chinese Communist Party stayed silent for a week waited until 3000 ppl had been infected before alerting the global community of the COVID-19 outbreak. Great news! On Sunday Saudi Arabia & Russia agreed to cut oil production while #COVID19 continues to drive demand down.   The OPEC deal will provide relief for Texas's energy industry & the global economy. Thank you @POTUS for your strong leadership during these negotiations.
